declarations.name: findMatch
declarations.description: Recursive helper to find matching tokens.

declarations.name: markTokens

type.text: { matched: number[] | null } | { matched: number[] | null }[]

declarations.description:
If given a flat Token[], tries to match & flip exactly as before.
If given Token[][], first picks only those sub‐arrays with the
**highest current count** of `marked===true`, and runs the flat logic
on them; all others return `{ matched: null }`.

declarations.name: getGroupsWithMaxMarkedTokens
declarations.description:
Filters an array of token groups, returning only those with the maximum
number of marked tokens.

declarations.name: anyMarked
declarations.description: Returns true if any token was newly marked.

declarations.name: selectBestGroup
declarations.description:
Selects the "best" token sequence from an array of candidate groups.
Criteria:
 1. Highest number of tokens with `marked === true`
 2. (Tiebreaker) Minimize formality_score^2 + gender_score^2 (prefers neutral)
 3. (Tiebreaker) Lexically shortest (surface form length)

declarations.name: isCompleted
declarations.description:
Returns true if every non-punctuation token in the array is marked.
Checks for common Japanese punctuation POS tags.

declarations.name: makeQuestion

parameters.name: english
parameters.description: English text with optional furigana annotations

parameters.name: answerGrammar
parameters.description:
Map from answer text to grammar analysis.
  Each answer MUST have a corresponding entry with kotogram data.

declarations.description:
Creates a Question object from an English prompt and Japanese answer(s).
English can include furigana annotations in brackets: "word[ふりがな]"

A Japanese kana input control component with optional question/progress display.
Converts romaji input to kana using WanaKana IME mode.
declarations.name: KanaControl

cssParts.description: The complete/skip button inside the input
cssParts.name: action-button

members.name: parsedEnglish
members.description: Parsed English parts with furigana annotations.

members.name: _furiganaVisibility
members.description: Visibility state for each furigana annotation.

members.name: _wrongAttempts
members.description: Number of wrong attempts for the current question.

members.name: _correctAttempts
members.description: List of correct attempts for the current question.

members.name: _revealedHintIndices
members.description: Set of indices of English words for which the hint was revealed.

members.name: _revealedAnswer
members.description:
Whether the full answer has been revealed (after user gave up).
When true, the skeleton displays the full answer with missed parts highlighted.

members.name: _expandedGrammarAnswer
members.description:
The answer text for which grammar detail is currently expanded.
null if no grammar detail is shown.

members.name: debug
members.description: Debug mode - shows all possible remaining sentences.

members.name: initialScore
members.description: Initial score for a question. Defaults to 100.

members.name: correctGuessFactor
members.description:
Factor to multiply score by when a correct guess is made.
Defaults to 0.95.

members.name: incorrectGuessFactor
members.description:
Factor to multiply score by when an incorrect guess is made.
Defaults to 0.7.

members.name: score
members.description:
Current score for the active question.
-1 indicates the question has not been started or score is hidden.
The score is updated based on user guesses:
- Correct guess: score * correctGuessFactor (unless completed)
- Incorrect guess: score * incorrectGuessFactor
- Reveal answer: score * (incorrectGuessFactor ^ missing_tokens)

members.name: supplyQuestion
members.description:
Supply a new question to display.
Resets all state related to the previous question (attempts, hints, revealed answer).

events.name: question-complete
events.description: Fired when the question is completed successfully. Detail is `{ finalSkeleton: string, wrongAttempts: number, correctAttempts: string[], englishHints: string[], score: number }`.

events.name: request-next-question
events.description: Fired when the user requests the next question (by clicking the button or pressing Enter after completion).

events.name: question-skipped
events.description: Fired when the question is skipped. Detail is `{ finalSkeleton: string, wrongAttempts: number, correctAttempts: string[], englishHints: string[], score: number }`.

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: Debug mode - shows all possible remaining sentences.

attributes.name: initialScore
attributes.description: Initial score for a question. Defaults to 100.

attributes.name: correctGuessFactor
attributes.description:
Factor to multiply score by when a correct guess is made.
Defaults to 0.95.

attributes.name: incorrectGuessFactor
attributes.description:
Factor to multiply score by when an incorrect guess is made.
Defaults to 0.7.
